info.name: TD Basic Dark
info.description: Basic dark theme for TD 2.1 & 2.0. Requires "Torrent Title Font-Weight" set to "Bold when New" in settings.
info.additionalInfo:
2017-02-02: Site code change requiring bug fix.

2017-01-20: Minor edit, background colour of blockquotes on user posts pages hadn't been changed.

2016-12-18-bugfix: Inadvertently broke several pages, fixed now but my break again if this info box disappears.
2016-12-18: Removed info box on circumventing censorship, it may be useful info but it was ugly and taking up space I wanted back. This may instead/also remove donate adverts, TD didn't make it easy to target just the info box.

2016-12-09: Removed TD Browser links - I can't abide any static floating links.

2016-11-29: NOTE: Site seems to be being worked on currently, something may break in the near future.
UPDATE: Minor update, "Clear New" button wasn't being highlighted in torrents 2.0.
UPDATE 2: Added .it domain.

2016-11-02: Added styling for Torrents 2.0, due to introduction of "Related Torrents" using Torrents 2.0 code. Impossible to get it the same, but it's close.

2016-05-04: Bug fixes: missed & wrongly targeted elements.
